Villager.name: Villager
Villager.description: Ordinary resident with no night power but vital voice in daytime debates.
Villager.goal_prompt: Keep sharp notes about player behaviour and vote to execute suspected werewolves each day.

Seer.name: Seer
Seer.description: Mystic who divines alignments during the night.
Seer.goal_prompt: Inspect one player each night using an action like 'inspect NAME'; leak findings strategically without exposing yourself too early.

Witch.name: Witch
Witch.description: Potion expert who may save one player per game and poison one player per game during the night.
Witch.goal_prompt: During your witch phase, decide whether to 'save NAME', 'poison NAME', or pass. Use your limited potions wisely to keep villagers alive and remove wolves when confident.

Werewolf.name: Werewolf
Werewolf.description: Predator hiding among villagers, coordinating nightly kills and sowing mistrust by day.
Werewolf.goal_prompt: Confer quietly with fellow wolves at night. Use actions like 'kill NAME' to propose a victim. During the day, blend in while pushing misdirection.
